channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Jimmy Kimmel Address Suspension, Sarah McLachlan Perform on Kimmel
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel gets real 🎤 with Sarah McLachlan's angelic performance on his show! 🌟 Don't miss the heartwarming moment! ✨ #LateNightMagic

item.title: John Waters Reveals 2025 Christmas Tour Dates
item.description: 🎄🎅 Get festive with John Waters! Tour dates for his 2025 Christmas shows are here! Who's ready for a jolly good time? 🎶✨ #JohnWaters #ChristmasTour

item.title: Ratboys Announce Tour, Share Video for New Song “Light Night Mountains All That”: Watch
item.description: 🎸✨ Ratboys hitting the road and blessing our ears with a new bop! Watch the video now! 🚌🎶 #musicnews #RatboysTour

item.title: Phoenix Team Up with French House Duo Braxe + Falcon on New Song “UFO”: Stream
item.description: 🚀 Phoenix and Braxe + Falcon take us on a cosmic ride with their new track "UFO"! Tune in now! 🎶✨ #NewMusicAlert #Phoenix #BraxeAndFalcon

item.title: Danny Brown Announces New Album Stardust, Sets 2025 Tour
item.description: 🚀✨ Buckle up, Danny Brown fans! Stardust album drops soon, with a galaxy-trotting 2025 tour in the works! 🛸🔥 #DannyBrown #StardustTour
